images.description: A religious scene depicting the blessing of the sacrament
Painting by Carl Bloch showing Christ speaking with the Samaritan woman at the well
Painting by Heinrich Hofmann depicting Christ's encounter with the rich young ruler
Biblical scene showing Jesus cleansing the temple of money changers
Historical scene of pioneers crossing a river during westward migration
A scene depicting prayer or religious devotion
The Salt Lake City Temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
Historical scene depicting the saving of the Book of Commandments from destruction
